lexUnit.name: rationalize.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: attempt to justify (an action or attitude) with logical reasoning

sentence.text: Henry shook his head ; he had clearly abandoned all pretence of trying to rationalize the situation .
